//===== rAthena Script =======================================
//= Custom Shop NPC
//===== Description: =========================================
//= Custom Shop NPC (Pre-Renewal).
//============================================================

turbo_room	mapflag	noteleport

-	script	BasicShop	-1,{
	OnInit:
		bindatcmd "shop",strnpcinfo(3) + "::OnAtcommand";
		end;
	OnAtcommand:
		warp "turbo_room", 100, 100;
		end;

}

turbo_room,99,61,0	warp	specialmarket#exit03	1,1,turbo_room,156,188
